column2: but I was with a friend who keeps kosher. We got mushrooms. I was already skeptical it was going to be boring
column3: but heavens no. It was cheesy goodness. In correct proportions of sauce cheese crust. I can't wait to drag my husband to chicago to get this again
column4: but with pepperoni. My husband and I went last year on Chicago pizza tour (see my precious yelp review). We got to try amazing places
column5: such as pizanos and pequod. I've been to giordano's too. All good but the malnati's take the cake!
